name: Scooby Doo The Bros. Adventure
overview: Scooby and Shaggy are back in an all-new adventure. Join your favorite slackers as they try to solve a mystery of super mario proportions. Scooby & Shaggy were at Velma's Birthday Party. During the party, a monster kidnapped Velma, Help Scooby and Shaggy find & rescue Velma, defeat the monsters, and solve the mystery. Would you help Scooby and Shaggy solve this mystery for a Scooby Snack? This NSMB custom game was brought to you by faith genesis raven from Darkumbra
